main.name: Paul G. Ottenwalder
main.bio: Hi there! I am Paul!. I love working on software problems and designing solutions to solve complex problems. Focus on the details and work hard. I am a Computer Engineer having 5+ years of website development, design, and database experience. I have done projects for various clients on internal projects for the management of team and accounting system, etc. I have hands-on experience in PHP, Postgresql, Mysql, GrapQL, Javascript, Jquery, Node JS, React JS, Vue js, HTML, CSS, Photoshop. Experienced in development, configuration, optimization, migration. Working with various plugins and widgets, customization according to client requirements.

education.school: Universidad Tecnologica de Santiago - UTESA - DR

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description: Design and Build Solution in React, Python, GraphQL, MongoDB and Airtable for speed up the global manufacturing of clothing to change the way thats work first Design, then Sell and last Make.

work.title: Full Stack Programmer
work.description: Designing and Builing solution for a self handle ERP System on PHP, Jquery and PostgreSQL

testimonials.text: Paul is absolutely excellent, Studying and working with him has been great, we always learn something awesome and new to apply it to our real world jobs ... I would definitely recommend
Working with Paul has been AWESOME, he works and focus always on the results and optimization.
